title: Marlas Apothecary, aromatherapy
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Aromatherapy is the use of essential oils (distilled from seeds, roots, leaves, or flowers) to enhance and balance body mind and spirit. Aromatherapy is an essential element of Physic (see [Heilkunst)](http://www.heilkunst.com/) In other words it is part of a regimen than can bring you back into a balanced state of health. Aromatherapy can be complimentary to many other forms of health care and can be used to enhance both physiological and psycho-emotional states. Marla Shertz Wilson
